text:
@sagarikaghose So you want people to die in India???
Almost 40K+ people have already died because of COVID-19 in USA, 26k+ ppl in Italy and approximately same numbers in Spain, France. Ma'am if the lockdown wasn't implemented n if ppl would have died then it would have u to criticize Modi govt.
